prompt: [{'content': "Please read the following text and summarize it. The final output should be limited to 50 words. Here is the text: NAME_1 has been granted extra time to decide whether to compete in the World Cross-Country Championships.The 31-year-old is concerned the event, which starts on 19 March in France, could upset her preparations for the London Marathon on 17 April. 'There is no question that NAME_2 would be a huge asset to the GB team,' said NAME_3 of UK Athletics. 'But she is working out whether she can accommodate the worlds without too much compromise in her marathon training.' NAME_4 must make a decision by Tuesday - the deadline for team nominations. British team member NAME_5 said the team would understand if NAME_4 opted out of the event. 'It would be fantastic to have NAME_2 in the team,' said the European cross-country champion. 'But you have to remember that athletics is basically an individual sport and anything achieved for the team is a bonus. 'She is not messing us around. We all understand the problem.' NAME_4 was world cross-country champion in 2001 and 2002 but missed last year's event because of injury. In her absence, the GB team won bronze in Brussels.", 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The response contains no more than 50 words (including numbers and punctuation).', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary clearly identifies NAME_1 and the pending decision regarding participation in the World Cross‑Country Championships.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response is a concise summary that does not copy full sentences from the source text.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary explicitly states that the athlete is deciding whether to compete in the World Cross‑Country Championships because it may disrupt her London Marathon preparation.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary accurately states that NAME_1 has been granted extra time and that the decision is not yet final.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary mentions the deadline (Tuesday) or extra time granted for the decision.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary identifies the athlete as a former world cross‑country champion or indicates her high‑status experience.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary notes that the athlete would be a huge asset or significantly strengthen the GB team if she competes.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary states that the athlete’s marathon training and individual goals are a valid priority in her decision.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary captures that UK Athletics wants her to run, while teammates would understand if she prioritizes the marathon.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary correctly names both the World Cross‑Country Championships and the London Marathon as the events discussed.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary indicates that UK Athletics and teammates understand and accept her dilemma without blaming her.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary is presented as one (or at most two) continuous sentences, not as bullet points or fragmented fragments.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary omits unnecessary details such as specific dates, past victory years, or names of officials.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The language used is neutral or sympathetic, avoiding criticism or pressure toward either choice.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary contains 50 words or fewer, counting all tokens including numbers and punctuation.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary includes the exact phrase "granted extra time" describing the athlete\'s decision window.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The word "nomination" appears anywhere in the summary, indicating the deadline context.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary contains the exact phrase "final decision" to denote the athlete\'s concluding choice.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary uses the exact wording "teammates understand" to convey team sentiment.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt: [{'content': 'Explain the different redox states of oxygen in coordination compounds. Explain how an oxygen ligand behaves in different oxidation states.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The answer explicitly explains (a) the different redox states of oxygen in coordination compounds and (b) how oxygen ligands behave in each oxidation state.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response states or clearly implies that the discussion uses the formal oxidation‑state framework and is limited to coordination/transition‑metal complexes, not free oxygen species.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer describes O²⁻ (oxo/oxide) ligands, giving their formal oxidation state (‑2), σ‑donor/π‑donor character, typical M=O or μ‑oxo motifs, and their role in stabilizing high‑valent metals.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer explains OH⁻ ligands as oxygen at –2, discusses their basicity, typical M–OH and μ‑hydroxo motifs, hydrogen‑bonding, and pH‑dependent aqua/hydroxo interconversion.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer discusses H₂O as a neutral oxygen ligand (overall O oxidation state –2), its weak donor character, typical terminal coordination, and its role as a precursor to OH⁻/O²⁻ in redox and acid–base processes.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer describes O₂²⁻ (peroxo) ligands, stating each O has oxidation state –1, typical η² and μ‑η²:η² coordination, donor character, O–O bond cleavage to oxo/hydroxo species, and their intermediate role in O–O chemistry.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer explains O₂⁻ (superoxo) ligands, giving an average oxidation state of –½ per O, paramagnetism, η¹/η² binding modes, π* interactions with metal d orbitals, and their function as oxidizing activated dioxygen species.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer discusses O₂ as a neutral ligand (oxygen oxidation state 0), η¹/η² binding, backbonding into π* orbitals, and how formal assignments (O₂, O₂⁻, O₂²⁻) depend on metal oxidation state and electron transfer.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer mentions at least one additional O‑based ligand (e.g., hydroperoxo OOH⁻), provides its formal oxidation state, typical metal binding mode, and its role as an intermediate in proton/electron‑coupled steps.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer clearly distinguishes more reduced ligands (O²⁻, OH⁻), intermediate ligands (O₂²⁻, OOH⁻), and less reduced/neutral ligands (O₂, H₂O), relating formal oxidation states to general donor/acceptor properties.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer explicitly explains how oxygen‑ligand behavior changes with oxidation state, covering donor strength, π‑interactions, basicity, typical coordination modes, and whether the ligand acts as an oxidant or base.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer describes the main redox and protonation interconversions among oxygen ligands (e.g., O₂ → superoxo → peroxo → oxo/hydroxo; aqua ⇌ hydroxo ⇌ oxo via PCET and acid–base steps).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer includes at least two specific complexes or enzymes (e.g., permanganate, chromate, heme‑oxo, hemoglobin) to illustrate oxidation states and ligand behaviors.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All formal oxidation states and charges assigned to oxygen ligands in the response are correct, consistent, and free of contradictions.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer mentions relevant bonding features (σ‑donation, π‑donation/acceptance, occupancy of π* orbitals, paramagnetism) that rationalize reactivity and coordination for at least three key ligand types.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer connects each redox state of oxygen to its characteristic reactivity (e.g., nucleophilic oxo vs oxidizing superoxo/peroxo) and to roles in catalysis or biological oxygen activation/transport.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The information is presented in a clear, structured order (e.g., by ligand class or oxidation level) without disorganized lists or scattered statements.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response provides sufficient detail to match the depth of a reference answer while avoiding unnecessary digressions, covering all requested concepts compactly.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer mentions that oxygen can act as a non‑innocent ligand, creating ambiguity in oxidation‑state assignments due to metal‑ligand electron transfer.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer correctly identifies and lists the four primary oxygen redox categories: neutral dioxygen, superoxide, peroxide, and oxide.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For neutral O₂, the answer provides the oxidation state (0), an O–O bond length near 1.21\u202fÅ, and an IR stretching frequency around 1550\u202fcm⁻¹.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For superoxide, the answer states the average oxidation state (–½ per O), end‑on (Pauling) geometry, IR stretching range 1100–1200\u202fcm⁻¹, and paramagnetic character.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For peroxide, the answer states the oxidation state (–1 per O), side‑on (Griffith) geometry, IR stretching range 800–900\u202fcm⁻¹, and diamagnetic character.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For oxide, the answer gives the oxidation state (–2), notes cleavage of the O–O bond, and describes its ability to stabilize high‑valent metal centers.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer explains the trend from electrophilic behavior (neutral O₂) to nucleophilic/basic behavior (peroxide, oxide) as the ligand becomes more reduced.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer connects added electrons to occupation of antibonding orbitals, resulting in increased O–O bond length and decreased vibrational frequency across the series O₂ → superoxide → peroxide.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer provides specific numerical ranges for bond lengths and IR frequencies that are comparable to literature values.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer contains a formatted table (or equivalent structured list) that for each oxygen redox state with an O–O bond (O₂, superoxide, peroxide) lists the literature‑consistent O–O bond length range (±0.02\u202fÅ), IR stretching frequency range (±50\u202fcm⁻¹), magnetic state (paramagnetic/diamagnetic), and O–O bond order.', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer explicitly defines a “non‑innocent” oxygen ligand and explains how this property creates ambiguity in formal oxidation‑state assignments for metal‑oxygen complexes.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer provides the O–O bond order for each redox state (O₂, O₂⁻, O₂²⁻) in a clear, numeric form (e.g., 2.0, 1.5, 1.0) and links the bond order to the corresponding oxidation state and electron count.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

Water + Fire = {"name":"Steam"} Air + Fire = {"name":"Heat"} Dark + Light = {"name":"Illusion"} Air + Water = {"name":"Cloud"} Water + Earth = {"name":"Erosion"} Dark + Earth = {"name":"Decay"} Light + Dark = ', 'role': 'user'}]

       {'criterion': '分别列出不少于3条赞赏守纪、3条提醒改进、3条肯定主动学习的英文评价句。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': '内容覆盖肯定赞赏、启发引导、纠错反馈、批判性思维、小组合作、作业布置等至少六个评价维度。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': '提供至少3条用于引导学生继续表达、深化思考或自我修正的支架式英文句子。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '列出至少3条用于挑战学生观点、鼓励反向思考、促进元认知的高阶评价英文句。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': '文章包含引言、原则、分类语料、应用场景、结语等结构层次，排版整洁，易于阅读。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt: [{'content': 'Ciao come faccio a pubblicare una foto live mele storie di Instagram ', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'La risposta è scritta interamente in italiano corretto e utilizza un tono amichevole e chiaro, adeguato a una domanda informale su Instagram.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "La risposta presume l'uso di un iPhone, richiede chiarimento sul modello o sulla versione iOS e menziona la necessità di avere l’app Instagram aggiornata.", 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Spiega che le Live Photo di iPhone non possono essere caricate come contenuto ‘live’ su Instagram senza prima essere convertite.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Indica che per trasformare una Live Photo in Boomerang nelle Storie di Instagram occorre aprire una nuova Storia, accedere al rullino, selezionare la Live Photo e tenere premuto il dito per convertirla.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Elenca passo‑passo i seguenti punti: (1) aprire Instagram → Storie; (2) toccare l’icona della galleria; (3) scegliere la Live Photo; (4) tenere premuto finché compare l’effetto Boomerang; (5) personalizzare (testo, sticker) e pubblicare.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Indica le azioni da compiere se la pressione non genera il Boomerang (es. provare con un’altra Live Photo, aggiornare Instagram o iOS).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Spiega che la Live Photo può essere salvata come video dall’app Foto e poi caricata nelle Storie di Instagram.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Fornisce i passaggi: aprire la Live Photo in Foto, verificare l’icona LIVE, toccare Condividi → Salva come video (o equivalente).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Descrive come selezionare il video salvato e pubblicarlo nelle Storie, includendo l’opzione di aggiungere testo, sticker o musica.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Menziona l’uso di app esterne (es. Lively, intoLive) qualora l’opzione ‘Salva come video’ non fosse disponibile.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Elenca a grandi linee: scaricare l’app, importare la Live Photo, esportarla come video, caricare il video nelle Storie.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Suggerisce di tenere premuta la foto in Foto per accertarsi che si animi, confermando che è una Live Photo.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Ricorda che le Storie hanno una durata massima di 15\u202fsecondi; i video più lunghi vengono automaticamente tagliati.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'La risposta è organizzata in sezioni numerate o puntate, facilitando la lettura e l’esecuzione.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Fornisce almeno due metodi distinti (Boomerang diretto e conversione in video) per pubblicare la Live Photo nelle Storie.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Indica che Instagram e iOS devono essere aggiornati per garantire la compatibilità con le Live Photo.', 'points': 3, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Chiede informazioni sul modello di iPhone o sulla versione iOS per offrire indicazioni più precise.', 'points': 3, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Mantiene le spiegazioni semplici, prive di tecnicismi inutili, senza digressioni non pertinenti.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Avverte che, se non si esegue la pressione o la conversione, la foto verrà pubblicata come immagine statica.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Contestualizza che le Live Photo sono una funzionalità esclusiva dei dispositivi iPhone/Apple.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Le istruzioni sono fornite passo dopo passo, in ordine logico, e sono facili da seguire.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "La risposta richiede esplicitamente all'utente informazioni sul modello di iPhone e sulla versione di iOS per fornire indicazioni personalizzate.", 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "La risposta descrive almeno un metodo alternativo che utilizza un'app di terze parti (es. Lively, intoLive) per convertire la Live Photo in video quando l'opzione nativa non è disponibile.", 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'La risposta menziona il limite massimo di 15\u202fsecondi delle Storie di Instagram e fornisce una raccomandazione su come gestire video più lunghi (es. taglio, segmentazione).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "La risposta cita una versione specifica di iOS (es. iOS\u202f17) e adatta le istruzioni di conseguenza, indicando eventuali differenze nell'interfaccia o nelle opzioni disponibili.", 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "La risposta elenca una procedura di troubleshooting dettagliata da seguire se la pressione non genera il Boomerang (es. provare con un'altra Live Photo, aggiornare Instagram o iOS, verificare impostazioni Live).", 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

       {'criterion': 'Se indica cocinar a fuego mínimo o muy bajo para evitar que la base se queme antes de que el interior esté cocido.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Se incluye una breve descripción del aspecto y textura esperada de la torta (ej. húmeda, tipo budín).', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Se proporcionan consejos para evitar quemaduras o que la masa se pegue (p.ej., fuego bajo, difusor, engrasado).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Se dan instrucciones claras para desmoldar o voltear la torta sin horno (p.ej., usar plato y girar).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Se explica cómo dar vuelta la torta o cómo verificar que esté completamente cocida antes de servir.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'La respuesta está estructurada en secciones (ingredientes, procedimiento, variantes) y es fácil de leer.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Se utiliza español claro, cercano y respetuoso, apropiado para un contexto familiar.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Se proponen al menos una variante más saludable (ej. harina integral, menos azúcar, más fruta).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Cuando faltan datos (número o edad de niños), la respuesta indica suposiciones o solicita precisión para ajustar cantidades o azúcar.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'La receta no menciona miel ni ningún endulzante derivado de miel como opción; únicamente se permiten endulzantes naturales no apícolas (p.\u202fej., banana, fruta) o azúcar dentro del límite especificado.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'El tiempo total de cocción (excluyendo la preparación) está indicado y es de 20 minutos o menos.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}}

prompt: [{'content': 'Write an introduction of better life pharmacyy with 2000-3000 words in chemical industry', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The introduction contains between 2,000 and 3,000 words inclusive.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response provides a detailed, multi-section discussion that meets or exceeds the 2,000-word minimum, demonstrating depth appropriate for an introduction.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text functions as an introductory overview of Better Life Pharmacy, not as a full report, marketing brochure, or unrelated document.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The content explicitly mentions Better Life Pharmacy (spelled as provided) and maintains focus on its role within the chemical industry throughout.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Better Life Pharmacy is positioned within the chemical and pharmaceutical industry, with discussion of its upstream and downstream value-chain roles and links to chemical processes.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Better Life Pharmacy is framed as part of a chemical-industry ecosystem encompassing synthesis, engineering, and manufacturing rather than merely a retail outlet.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The introduction describes the pharmacy’s downstream position relative to R&D, synthesis, formulation, manufacturing, and distribution, and explains how it translates products into patient outcomes.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text identifies relevant scientific disciplines (e.g., medicinal chemistry, pharmaceutical technology, pharmacology, toxicology, clinical pharmacy) and explains how each informs the pharmacy’s operations.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All chemical and pharmaceutical concepts (e.g., APIs, excipients, solubility, stability, degradation, toxicity) are presented accurately without factual errors or pseudoscientific claims.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The introduction includes technical details on active pharmaceutical ingredients, reaction engineering, stereochemistry, and purification methods such as crystallization or chromatography.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The content uses appropriate formulation science, medicinal chemistry terminology, and mentions analytical tools (e.g., HPLC, NMR, mass spectrometry) correctly.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text references applicable quality and regulatory frameworks (e.g., GPP, GMP, GDP, cGMP, controlled-substance regulations, documentation, traceability) relevant to a pharmacy operating in the chemical sector.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The introduction mentions raw-material testing, in-process controls, stability testing, and compliance with cGMP standards.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The piece addresses medication safety, adverse-event reporting, handling of high-risk chemicals/medicines, and the pharmacy’s role in pharmacovigilance.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative discusses supplier qualification, storage conditions, inventory control, cold-chain requirements, and risk-management practices within the pharmaceutical-chemical supply chain.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text mentions global sourcing strategies, resilience to disruptions, and multi-sourcing approaches in the chemical supply chain.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The introduction outlines core pharmacy services (dispensing, counseling, therapy optimization, compounding, health promotion) and links them to handling complex chemical products.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The content connects chemical processes to health outcomes by discussing pharmacokinetics, drug interactions, or medication-therapy management.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The piece describes digital tools, data management, telepharmacy, and adaptation to new modalities such as biologics or advanced delivery systems.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The introduction references Industry\u202f4.0 concepts such as AI, blockchain for traceability, and personalized-medicine or pharmacogenomics advancements.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text addresses ethical responsibilities, patient rights, responsible chemical use, and environmentally sound disposal or waste-management of pharmaceuticals.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The introduction mentions green-chemistry principles, waste prevention, safer solvents, or energy-efficiency measures relevant to the pharmacy’s operations.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The piece provides a forward-looking perspective on trends such as personalized medicine, AI, and sustainability, linking Better Life Pharmacy’s vision to evolving industry directions.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The content is organized into clear sections or logical paragraphs (optionally with headings) that follow a coherent structure.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The document includes an executive summary, numbered or titled sections, and a concluding paragraph, following professional report formatting.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All arguments and explanations are internally consistent, with no contradictions regarding the pharmacy’s role or the nature of the chemical industry.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The writing maintains a formal, informative tone appropriate for an industry audience, avoiding slang, overt marketing language, or casual style.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Sentences and paragraphs are well-formed, clear, and logically connected, enabling an educated non-expert reader to follow the discussion.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text refrains from giving individual medical treatment advice; any therapeutic statements are presented as general information within an industry context.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'If factual details about Better Life Pharmacy are unknown, the introduction explicitly treats it as a hypothetical or generalized entity rather than fabricating unverifiable specifics.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text spells the pharmacy name exactly as "Better Life Pharmacyy" (including the double "y") in every occurrence.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The total number of words in the response is between 2,000 and 3,000 inclusive.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Every top‑level section heading starts with a numeric label followed by a period (e.g., "1. Introduction", "2. API Manufacturing").', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The supply‑chain section explicitly contains both the phrase "multi‑sourcing" and the phrase "AI‑driven demand forecasting".', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt: [{'content': 'M1芯片的macbook， 虚拟机上安装centos 7 选择X86还是arm架构 ', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '答案明确推荐在 M1 Mac 上安装 CentOS\u202f7 时选择 ARM/aarch64 架构，并且未把 x86_64 作为首选或等同选项。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答指出 Apple Silicon（M1/M2）芯片基于 ARM（aarch64）架构，而非 x86_64。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案清晰区分在 M1 上使用原生 ARM 虚拟化与通过 QEMU 等对 x86 进行全系统仿真的两种方式。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答说明 ARM 原生虚拟化在 M1 上的运行性能明显优于 x86 仿真，并指出后者仅适用于特定测试场景。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案解释由于 M1 为 ARM 架构，使用相同架构的 CentOS\u202f7 通过虚拟化可获得接近原生的运行速度。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答提及 CentOS\u202f7 提供 ARM/aarch64 版本，但其软件包生态相对 x86_64 较不完整，可能出现缺失。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案说明在必须运行仅提供 x86 二进制的软件或需要与生产环境的 x86 CentOS\u202f7 完全一致时，可考虑使用 x86 仿真方案。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '针对常见用途（开发、学习、测试等）给出明确建议：首选在 M1 上使用 ARM/aarch64 版 CentOS\u202f7。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案同时列出 ARM 原生方案和 x86 仿真方案的优势与局限，未出现单向偏好。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答列举常见的 Apple Silicon 虚拟机软件（如 UTM、Parallels Desktop、VMware Fusion）并说明它们主要运行 ARM 客户机系统。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案指出主流虚拟机软件在 M1 上通常只能运行 ARM 架构的虚拟机，不能直接运行 x86_64 客户机。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答中正确使用并区分 aarch64/ARM、x86_64/x86、虚拟化、仿真等技术术语，未出现混用。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案提到在 ARM 上可能遇到软件包缺失或需自行编译的限制，并未作出不切实际的保证。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答在给出建议前明确假设使用的是 Apple Silicon 兼容的虚拟机软件，而非旧版仅支持 x86 的产品。', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案采用有条理的分段或项目符号结构，使每个要点易于阅读和辨识。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答在结尾提供简洁的结论句，概括“普通用途选 ARM；严格一致性可考虑 x86 仿真但性能差”。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案全程使用简体中文，表述自然流畅，未出现不必要的外语混杂。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答在涉及不确定细节时使用“可能”“视情况”等措辞，未作出绝对化断言。', 'points': 3, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案在不偏离主题的前提下主动提供如根据所用虚拟机软件的进一步安装指导提示。', 'points': 3, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答明确说明应下载带有 `aarch64` 标识的 CentOS\u202f7 镜像（或 AltArch 版本），而非默认的 x86_64 镜像。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案说明在 M1 上运行 x86 架构属于模拟（Emulation），会导致显著的性能下降和卡顿，仅通过 UTM 等软件实现。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答提醒用户在系统安装完成后，部署的应用软件（如 Docker、数据库等）也需要使用对应的 ARM64/aarch64 版本。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案必须列出官方 CentOS\u202f7 aarch64 ISO 的完整目录路径并提供至少一个具体文件名（如 `CentOS-7-aarch64-*.iso`），以便用户直接定位并下载该镜像。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案必须明确声明 Parallels Desktop 与 VMware Fusion 在 Apple Silicon (M1) 上只能运行 ARM 客户机，不能直接运行 x86_64 客户机。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案必须给出具体的性能下降数值（例如 “约为原生的 1/10” 或 “不超过 15% 的原生速度”），并说明该数值对应的评估依据。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案应提供完整的安装与选择指南，且不向用户索取额外的虚拟机软件信息或其他前置条件。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

       {'criterion': '答案清晰区分在 M1 上使用原生 ARM 虚拟化与通过 QEMU 等对 x86 进行全系统仿真的两种方式。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答说明 ARM 原生虚拟化在 M1 上的运行性能明显优于 x86 仿真，并指出后者仅适用于特定测试场景。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案解释由于 M1 为 ARM 架构，使用相同架构的 CentOS\u202f7 通过虚拟化可获得接近原生的运行速度。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答提及 CentOS\u202f7 提供 ARM/aarch64 版本，但其软件包生态相对 x86_64 较不完整，可能出现缺失。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案说明在必须运行仅提供 x86 二进制的软件或需要与生产环境的 x86 CentOS\u202f7 完全一致时，可考虑使用 x86 仿真方案。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '针对常见用途（开发、学习、测试等）给出明确建议：首选在 M1 上使用 ARM/aarch64 版 CentOS\u202f7。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案同时列出 ARM 原生方案和 x86 仿真方案的优势与局限，未出现单向偏好。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答列举常见的 Apple Silicon 虚拟机软件（如 UTM、Parallels Desktop、VMware Fusion）并说明它们主要运行 ARM 客户机系统。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案指出主流虚拟机软件在 M1 上通常只能运行 ARM 架构的虚拟机，不能直接运行 x86_64 客户机。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答中正确使用并区分 aarch64/ARM、x86_64/x86、虚拟化、仿真等技术术语，未出现混用。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案提到在 ARM 上可能遇到软件包缺失或需自行编译的限制，并未作出不切实际的保证。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答在给出建议前明确假设使用的是 Apple Silicon 兼容的虚拟机软件，而非旧版仅支持 x86 的产品。', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案采用有条理的分段或项目符号结构，使每个要点易于阅读和辨识。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答在结尾提供简洁的结论句，概括“普通用途选 ARM；严格一致性可考虑 x86 仿真但性能差”。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案全程使用简体中文，表述自然流畅，未出现不必要的外语混杂。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答在涉及不确定细节时使用“可能”“视情况”等措辞，未作出绝对化断言。', 'points': 3, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案在不偏离主题的前提下主动提供如根据所用虚拟机软件的进一步安装指导提示。', 'points': 3, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答明确说明应下载带有 `aarch64` 标识的 CentOS\u202f7 镜像（或 AltArch 版本），而非默认的 x86_64 镜像。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案说明在 M1 上运行 x86 架构属于模拟（Emulation），会导致显著的性能下降和卡顿，仅通过 UTM 等软件实现。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '回答提醒用户在系统安装完成后，部署的应用软件（如 Docker、数据库等）也需要使用对应的 ARM64/aarch64 版本。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案必须列出官方 CentOS\u202f7 aarch64 ISO 的完整目录路径并提供至少一个具体文件名（如 `CentOS-7-aarch64-*.iso`），以便用户直接定位并下载该镜像。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案必须明确声明 Parallels Desktop 与 VMware Fusion 在 Apple Silicon (M1) 上只能运行 ARM 客户机，不能直接运行 x86_64 客户机。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案必须给出具体的性能下降数值（例如 “约为原生的 1/10” 或 “不超过 15% 的原生速度”），并说明该数值对应的评估依据。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案应提供完整的安装与选择指南，且不向用户索取额外的虚拟机软件信息或其他前置条件。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}}

prompt: [{'content': 'Using the following outline, write a complete academic paper: In the Shang Dynasty, filial piety was realized through ancestor worship: (1) deifying ancestors, that is, sealing ancestors as gods; (2) asking the gods, that is, seeking the opinions of ancestors; (3) nurturing the gods, that is, offering sacrifices to ancestors; (4) praising the gods, that is, promoting the reputation of ancestors through texts passed down through generations. Please provide 50 references.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The paper contains a Title, Abstract, Keywords, clearly divided sections for the main body, and a Conclusion.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The document follows the formal academic paper format: Title, Abstract, Introduction, distinct body sections aligned with the outline, and a Conclusion.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The main body sequentially develops the four sections: deifying ancestors, asking the gods, nurturing the gods, and praising the gods, each with substantive discussion.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The paper explicitly addresses all four required points (deifying ancestors, asking gods, nurturing gods, praising gods) in separate sections.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The section on deifying ancestors explains the Shang concept of ancestor deification, the hierarchy of divine ancestors, the temple system, and its relation to royal authority.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The deification section details how ancestors are transformed into spiritual powers within a hierarchical system, beyond mere remembrance.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The asking gods section provides a detailed analysis of divination practices, cites representative oracle‑bone inscriptions, and interprets their religious, political, and filial significance.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The asking gods section identifies oracle‑bone pyromancy as the method of consultation and explains its role in seeking ancestral will.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The nurturing gods section describes the sacrificial system, including offerings, ritual vessels, spatial arrangement, procedural steps, temporal cycles, and rank distinctions.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The nurturing gods section details specific ritual offerings (food, wine, livestock) and the use of bronze vessels to sustain ancestral spirits.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The praising gods section analyzes how oral tradition, oracle‑bone texts, bronze inscriptions, and later literature commemorate ancestors, shaping their reputation and filial symbolism.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The praising gods section connects the creation of bronze inscriptions and other texts to the documentation of ancestor virtue and lineage legitimacy.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The paper clearly defines Shang filial piety and distinguishes it from later Confucian moralizations, framing it as a religious‑political practice.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The argument demonstrates that the four ritual practices constitute a form of filial piety in the Shang context, understood as a political/religious obligation.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The work constructs an analytical framework linking ancestor worship, royal power, kinship structures, and filial piety, showing internal logical relationships.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The paper briefly discusses how Shang ancestor worship and filial practices influenced Zhou rites and Confucian filial doctrine.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The analysis of asking gods, sacrificial rites, and ancestor systems is grounded primarily in oracle‑bone evidence, with appropriate citations.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The discussion of praising ancestors, ritual vessels, and temples incorporates bronze inscriptions, bronze artifacts, and excavation findings.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript integrates both Chinese and English scholarly sources on Shang religion, archaeology, and filial concepts.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text is written in formal, standard academic Chinese without colloquial expressions, exclamations, or grammatical errors.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The writing maintains a formal, objective, analytical tone, avoiding casual language and bullet‑point lists within the main text.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Each paragraph and section follows a clear logical progression, with arguments supported by evidence and no contradictions.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The abstract accurately summarizes the research object, perspective, structure, and conclusions; 2–6 relevant keywords are listed.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The paper’s title directly reflects the focus on Shang dynasty, filial piety, ancestor worship, and the four ritual practices.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The manuscript’s length and depth meet the expectations of a full academic paper, providing thorough development of all four sections.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All claims are supported by evidence; speculative statements are clearly marked as hypotheses or omitted.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "The bibliography lists at least 50 distinct references and is presented in a separate 'References' section.", 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The reference list includes works covering oracle‑bone studies, Shang history, religious history, ritual practice, and ethics, representing both Chinese and foreign scholars.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Every cited work is directly relevant to the Shang dynasty, ancestor worship, filial piety, or early Chinese religious‑political contexts.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All listed sources are plausible, scholarly publications (books, journal articles, edited volumes) pertinent to the topic, not fabricated filler entries.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Each reference provides complete bibliographic information (author, title, publication details) and follows a consistent citation style throughout.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The conclusion synthesizes the four ritual practices and their role in Shang filial piety, highlighting historical significance and research implications.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'All main body sections are numbered sequentially (1., 2., 3., 4.) with English headings.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The abstract is written in English, contains no more than 250 words, and explicitly includes the phrase "Shang Dynasty".', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "The bibliography is sorted alphabetically by the first author's last name (case‑insensitive).", 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Each reference entry places the publication year in parentheses immediately after the author name(s).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The paper contains a distinct section titled exactly "Conclusion" (English) after the main body.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt: [{'content': 'Faça um roteiro de vídeo curto (máximo 3 minutos de duração) sobre o homem que forjou a própria morte, ROBERT HOAGLAND.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'O texto está 100\u202f% em português, sem palavras em outra língua, e utiliza linguagem clara, envolvente e acessível ao público geral.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'O roteiro está estruturado separando visual (cenas, imagens) e áudio (narração, falas), usando marcadores claros (ex.: Visual:, Áudio:).', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A extensão do roteiro não excede 3 minutos de tempo de narração, conforme estimativa de palavras ou marcações de tempo.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'O roteiro inclui timestamps para cada seção e a soma dos tempos não ultrapassa 3 minutos.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'O roteiro inclui um título que menciona Robert Hoagland e alude ao fato de ele ter forjado sua própria morte.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'O roteiro está dividido em blocos claramente rotulados (ex.: Abertura, Contexto, Desaparecimento, Investigação, Revelação, Desfecho).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'O roteiro segue a sequência narrativa: Gancho (mistério), Contexto (investigação), Plot Twist (descoberta da nova identidade), Conclusão.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A primeira cena ou narração contém um elemento que desperta curiosidade imediata sobre o desaparecimento de Robert Hoagland.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

First Citizen: Your belly's answer? What! The kingly-crowned head, the vigilant eye, The counsellor heart, the arm our soldier, Our steed the leg, the tongue our trumpeter. With other muniments and petty helps In this our fabric, if that they-- NAME_1: What then? 'Fore me, this fellow speaks! What then? what then? First Citizen: Should by the cormorant belly be restrain'd, Who is the sink o' the body,-- NAME_1: Well, what then? First Citizen: The former agents, if they did complain, What could the belly answer? NAME_1: I will tell you If you'll bestow a small--of what you have little-- Patience awhile, you'll hear the belly's answer. First Citizen: Ye're long about it. NAME_1: Note me this, good friend; Your most grave belly was deliberate, Not rash like his accusers, and thus answer'd: 'True is it, my incorporate friends,' quoth he, 'That I receive the general food at first, Which you do live upon; and fit it is, Because I am the store-house and the shop Of the whole body: but, if you do remember, I send it through the

Summary:
1. In this dialogue, NAME_1 uses a comparison of the body and its various functions to explain the significance of the senators of Rome, asserting that they provide public benefits and uphold order.
2. NAME_2 criticizes the citizens for their fickleness and ingratitude, discussing their grievances about corn distribution and the dispersion of an', 'role': 'user'}]

prompt: [{'content': "你是IT解决方案专家,作为《1 云管平台的数据可视化与报表分析解决方案》方案的章节,请完整描述' 数据可视化与报表分析中的安全性与隐私保护措施',要求内容除空格之外在1800字以上,要求内容专业、数据充分、表达清晰、书面化、学术化,不能出现AI,ChatGPT和内容生成的描述,不能出现读者和提问等措辞,不能包含非常抱歉等措辞,不要体现你的身份信息,符合中国网络安全要求", 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '正文除空格外字符数≥1800，且未出现明显的内容堆砌或重复段落。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文使用专业书面化、学术化语言，无口语化表达，且符合中国网络安全监管要求。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中未出现‘AI’、‘ChatGPT’、‘内容生成’等词汇，也未提及作者身份或使用‘读者’、‘提问’等称呼。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文未出现‘抱歉’等道歉用语，也未包含与主题无关的客套话或自我评价。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '内容始终聚焦于云管平台的数据可视化与报表分析场景，体现多云和混合云环境特征。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中明确阐述全生命周期保护、最小权限、合规可审计以及安全与可用性平衡等总体安全原则。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '说明了统一身份认证、单点登录、多因素认证、密码策略及会话管理等具体实现措施。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '包含对RBAC、ABAC以及行列级权限的说明，并区分查看、导出、分享等操作的控制策略。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '阐述前后端及服务间通信采用TLS/HTTPS、VPN或专线隧道等加密传输机制。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '说明对静态数据进行加密、字段级加密、分级存储与隔离，并对备份与容灾数据实施安全控制。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '描述了敏感数据的识别范围、分类分级方法以及在可视化和报表中的标注与管理机制。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '提供静态脱敏、动态脱敏和多级脱敏策略的具体实现，并说明聚合展示和阈值控制等匿名化措施。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '提出防止通过字段关联重新识别的措施，如降维展示、分组统计和噪声添加等。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '覆盖认证授权日志、访问日志、操作日志、系统日志，并具备集中审计分析与追溯能力。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '描述阈值告警、异常行为识别、与SOC/SIEM联动以及自动化与人工相结合的响应机制。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '说明输入校验、防XSS/SQL注入、防点击劫持及内容安全策略等前端安全设计。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '阐述导出权限审批、导出内容脱敏、水印标识、链接有效期及访问限制等控制措施。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '提及移动设备管理、VPN或零信任访问、终端安全基线检查等针对外网访问的安全措施。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '说明跨云统一安全策略、多租户逻辑/物理隔离、租户级权限与自主管理机制。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '涉及变更管理、漏洞扫描与修补、最小暴露面以及配置基线等运维层面的安全措施。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '准确引用《网络安全法》《数据安全法》《个人信息保护法》等法规，并确保所有安全措施符合其要求。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '阐述数据使用规范、隐私影响评估、员工培训及保密要求等制度性安排。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '说明数据保留期限、分类清理策略、安全销毁方式以及最小化存储原则。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文采用章节或条目结构，层次清晰，包含引言、技术论述和总结，逻辑递进。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '在各项措施中提供适度的技术实现细节或典型场景示例，避免空泛口号。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文未出现‘AI’、‘ChatGPT’、‘内容生成’、‘非常抱歉’、‘你’、‘用户’等词汇，也未透露作者身份信息。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '阐述零信任架构，并说明从RBAC向基于属性的访问控制（ABAC）演进，包含时间、地点、设备等属性的动态权限计算。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '描述通过SQL重写实现的行级安全（RLS）和列级安全（CLS）机制，确保不同区域或职能的数据可见性受控。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '说明使用掩码、泛化等脱敏技术，并引入差分隐私，通过注入拉普拉斯或高斯噪声防止统计数据反推个人隐私。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '明确在传输和存储环节使用国密SM2（身份认证）、SM3（完整性）和SM4（数据加密）算法。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '提及使用密钥管理系统（KMS）和硬件安全模块（HSM）对报表中间结果集（Cube/缓存）进行透明加密。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '描述采用频域算法的矢量级隐形水印技术，具备抗拍照、缩放、裁剪等鲁棒性，用于泄露溯源。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '针对Excel/PDF导出设计显性水印和数据防泄露（DLP）扫描阻断机制，防止批量敏感数据外流。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '引入用户实体行为分析（UEBA）引擎，基于机器学习建立访问基线，能够识别并阻断偏离基线的异常行为。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文使用高度书面化、学术化语言，结构严谨（含引言、分层技术论述、总结），逻辑清晰，符合IT方案文档规范。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须在传输层和存储层同时使用国产密码算法 SM2、SM3、SM4，且说明 SM2 用于身份认证与密钥协商，SM4 用于数据载荷加密，SM3 用于完整性校验；存储的中间结果集（Cube/缓存）必须采用透明加密，并明确使用 KMS 配合 HSM 托管根密钥，且给出密钥轮换周期。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须实现基于 ABAC 的动态权限计算，并在数据库查询层通过解析用户 Token 动态重写 SQL，实现行级安全（RLS）和列级安全（CLS），且示例必须包括不同区域经理只能看到本区域数据的具体 SQL 重写逻辑。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须同时提供静态掩码、动态脱敏和差分隐私三种技术，差分隐私实现需明确使用拉普拉斯或高斯噪声并给出 ε（epsilon）参数或等价说明，说明噪声注入的数学公式。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须同时实现可视化页面的频域隐形水印（说明嵌入算法、抗裁剪、抗缩放、抗颜色变换的鲁棒性）和导出文件的显性水印（示例水印格式），并提供水印提取的技术步骤。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须说明使用专用密钥管理系统（KMS）结合硬件安全模块（HSM）进行根密钥托管，列出密钥的生成、分发、轮换、吊销和审计全流程，并要求对所有静态数据、字段级加密以及缓存数据统一使用该体系。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须在数据库层实现 RLS 与 CLS，提供具体的策略示例（如基于租户 ID、地区代码的行过滤语句和基于敏感字段标签的列过滤语句），并说明这些策略在报表渲染引擎中的自动调用机制。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

       {'criterion': '全文未出现‘AI’、‘ChatGPT’、‘内容生成’、‘非常抱歉’、‘你’、‘用户’等词汇，也未透露作者身份信息。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '阐述零信任架构，并说明从RBAC向基于属性的访问控制（ABAC）演进，包含时间、地点、设备等属性的动态权限计算。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '描述通过SQL重写实现的行级安全（RLS）和列级安全（CLS）机制，确保不同区域或职能的数据可见性受控。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': '明确在传输和存储环节使用国密SM2（身份认证）、SM3（完整性）和SM4（数据加密）算法。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '提及使用密钥管理系统（KMS）和硬件安全模块（HSM）对报表中间结果集（Cube/缓存）进行透明加密。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '描述采用频域算法的矢量级隐形水印技术，具备抗拍照、缩放、裁剪等鲁棒性，用于泄露溯源。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '针对Excel/PDF导出设计显性水印和数据防泄露（DLP）扫描阻断机制，防止批量敏感数据外流。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '引入用户实体行为分析（UEBA）引擎，基于机器学习建立访问基线，能够识别并阻断偏离基线的异常行为。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文使用高度书面化、学术化语言，结构严谨（含引言、分层技术论述、总结），逻辑清晰，符合IT方案文档规范。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须在传输层和存储层同时使用国产密码算法 SM2、SM3、SM4，且说明 SM2 用于身份认证与密钥协商，SM4 用于数据载荷加密，SM3 用于完整性校验；存储的中间结果集（Cube/缓存）必须采用透明加密，并明确使用 KMS 配合 HSM 托管根密钥，且给出密钥轮换周期。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须实现基于 ABAC 的动态权限计算，并在数据库查询层通过解析用户 Token 动态重写 SQL，实现行级安全（RLS）和列级安全（CLS），且示例必须包括不同区域经理只能看到本区域数据的具体 SQL 重写逻辑。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须同时提供静态掩码、动态脱敏和差分隐私三种技术，差分隐私实现需明确使用拉普拉斯或高斯噪声并给出 ε（epsilon）参数或等价说明，说明噪声注入的数学公式。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须同时实现可视化页面的频域隐形水印（说明嵌入算法、抗裁剪、抗缩放、抗颜色变换的鲁棒性）和导出文件的显性水印（示例水印格式），并提供水印提取的技术步骤。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须说明使用专用密钥管理系统（KMS）结合硬件安全模块（HSM）进行根密钥托管，列出密钥的生成、分发、轮换、吊销和审计全流程，并要求对所有静态数据、字段级加密以及缓存数据统一使用该体系。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '必须在数据库层实现 RLS 与 CLS，提供具体的策略示例（如基于租户 ID、地区代码的行过滤语句和基于敏感字段标签的列过滤语句），并说明这些策略在报表渲染引擎中的自动调用机制。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}}

prompt:
[{'content': 'Firma, w której pracuję (branża IT - programowanie, moja pierwsza praca) zakazała mi pracy zdalnej z powodu "za niskiej wydajności" i zmusiła do przychodzenia do biura. Wszyscy inni, włącznie z nowo zatrudnianymi, mają możliwość wyboru miejsca pracy i większość dalej pracuje z domu, jak podczas pandemii.

Nie zgadzam się z tym, że pracowałem za wolno, uważam że robiłem wszystko dobrze. Czy są jakieś zewnętrzne instytucje, jako że w samej firmie zrobiłem już chyba wszystko co mogłem i nie udało mi się przekonać do zmiany zdania, które by mi pomogły?

Dodam, że w umowie nic o pracy zdalnej nie ma, chociaż zacząłem pracę na początku pandemii i z wyjątkiem tych ostatnich kilku miesięcy pracowałem tylko zdalnie. Wszyscy oprócz mnie, z tego co wiem, dostali jakieś aneksy dotyczące pracy zdalnej w tym roku, ja nie.

Jeżeli nie można zrobić absolutnie nic, chciałbym żeby firma całkowicie mnie zwolniła, najlepiej bez okresu wypowiedzenia, tak żebym znalazł sobie inną pracę zdalną lub bliżej domu, bo aktualnie z powodu odległości do biura wcale nie mam prywatnego życia, poza weekendami praktycznie cały czas schodzi na pracę i dojazdy do odległego biura. W jaki najlepiej sposób najlepiej byłoby poprowadzić taką rozmowę, żeby to osiągnąć?

Sam złożyć wypowiedzenia nie mogę, bo żeby to zrobić rozumiem że musiałbym *wcześniej* znaleźć inną pracę, a aktualnie nikt (na razie 7 firm podało taki powód) mnie nie chce z powodu zbyt długiego okresu wypowiedzenia w aktualnej firmie. A gdy zapytałem o możliwość zawarcia aneksu skracającego okres wypowiedzenia, usłyszałem że nie ma takiej możliwości, że w momencie zatrudniania zgodziłem się na takie a nie inne warunki i nie ma możliwości ich zmiany.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź zawiera analizę kontekstu prawnego, w tym rodzaj umowy, okres wypowiedzenia oraz fakt braku zapisu o pracy zdalnej?', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź wyjaśnia, że brak zapisu o pracy zdalnej w umowie upoważnia pracodawcę do żądania pracy w biurze?', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź rozróżnia nierówne traktowanie od dyskryminacji i wskazuje, które z nich może mieć znaczenie prawne w kontekście odmowy pracy zdalnej?', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź opisuje kompetencje Państwowej Inspekcji Pracy, w tym możliwość przyjęcia skargi i ograniczenia jej działań w tej sprawie?', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź wymienia i krótko opisuje rolę związków zawodowych oraz prawnika specjalizującego się w prawie pracy jako potencjalnych doradców?', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź zaznacza, że udzielane informacje mają charakter ogólny i zaleca konsultację z profesjonalnym prawnikiem?', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź wyjaśnia, kiedy pracodawca może zastosować zwolnienie dyscyplinarne bez wypowiedzenia oraz konsekwencje takiego rozwiązania?', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź przedstawia legalne alternatywy, takie jak rozwiązanie umowy za porozumieniem stron lub negocjacje terminu odejścia?', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź wyjaśnia możliwość rozwiązania umowy za porozumieniem stron, różnicę między tym a wypowiedzeniem oraz warunki ustalania terminu?', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź dostarcza konkretne wskazówki, jak prowadzić spokojną i rzeczową rozmowę z pracodawcą w sprawie pracy zdalnej lub rozstania?', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź zawiera przykładowe frazy lub schematy wypowiedzi, które użytkownik może wykorzystać w spotkaniu?', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź sugeruje poproszenie o mierzalne kryteria wydajności, okres próbny w biurze oraz warunki powrotu do modelu zdalnego lub hybrydowego?', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź zachęca do otwartego zakomunikowania zamiaru odejścia i przedstawia argumenty biznesowe przeciwko utrzymywaniu niezmotywowanego pracownika?', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź odnosi się do problemu długiego okresu wypowiedzenia w Polsce i podaje praktyczne sposoby komunikacji z potencjalnymi pracodawcami?', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź proponuje konkretne rozwiązania przy negocjacji nowej umowy, takie jak skrócenie okresu wypowiedzenia lub rozpoczęcie pracy po 2–2,5 miesiąca?', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź podkreśla znaczenie niepalenia mostów, utrzymania dobrej atmosfery przy rozstaniu oraz wpływ referencji na przyszłe oferty?', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź uwzględnia wpływ sytuacji na życie prywatne, zaleca dbanie o równowagę i odradza działania autodestrukcyjne?', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź jest zorganizowana w przejrzyste sekcje lub punkty, prowadząc krok po kroku od analizy prawa do praktycznych strategii?', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź odpowiada na oba główne wątki pytania: możliwość skorzystania z instytucji zewnętrznych oraz sposób przeprowadzenia rozmowy w celu zmiany warunków lub odejścia?', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź używa poprawnego, zrozumiałego polskiego, zachowuje rzeczowy i empatyczny ton oraz nie zawiera agresji lub zachęty do łamania prawa?', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź szczegółowo analizuje, jak brak zapisu o pracy zdalnej i argument niskiej wydajności wpływają na prawo pracodawcy do żądania pracy w biurze?', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź opisuje, w jakich okolicznościach można zgłosić sprawę do Państwowej Inspekcji Pracy i jakie są szanse powodzenia?', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź zaleca użycie argumentów biznesowych (np. koszty, efektywność) podczas negocjacji z pracodawcą?', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź wskazuje możliwość wykorzystania zwolnienia lekarskiego lub zaległego urlopu jako elementu strategii odejścia?', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź ostrzega przed fałszywym grożeniem zwolnieniem lekarskim i zaleca odwoływanie się wyłącznie do rzeczywistego stanu zdrowia?', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Czy odpowiedź zawiera porady, jak radzić sobie z długim okresem wypowiedzenia w procesach rekrutacyjnych i jak komunikować chęć skrócenia tego okresu?', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response cites a specific recent amendment to the Polish Labour Code (e.g., the April\u202f2023 amendment) and explains how that amendment limits the employer’s right to demand office work.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response explicitly warns that fabricating sick leave or using a false L‑4 is illegal, can trigger disciplinary dismissal, and advises only legitimate medical certification.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response provides a concrete negotiation plan for obtaining hybrid or remote work, including a request for measurable performance criteria, a defined trial period, and a sample written request to the employer.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response quantifies the likelihood of a favorable outcome from a PIP complaint (e.g., “niewielkie”) and details the specific evidentiary thresholds required for PIP to intervene.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}
extra_info:
{'prompt': array([{'content': 'Firma, w której pracuję (branża IT - programowanie, moja pierwsza praca) zakazała mi pracy zdalnej z powodu "za niskiej wydajności" i zmusiła do przychodzenia do biura. Wszyscy inni, włącznie z nowo zatrudnianymi, mają możliwość wyboru miejsca pracy i większość dalej pracuje z domu, jak podczas pandemii.\n\nNie zgadzam się z tym, że pracowałem za wolno, uważam że robiłem wszystko dobrze. Czy są jakieś zewnętrzne instytucje, jako że w samej firmie zrobiłem już chyba wszystko co mogłem i nie udało mi się przekonać do zmiany zdania, które by mi pomogły?\n\nDodam, że w umowie nic o pracy zdalnej nie ma, chociaż zacząłem pracę na początku pandemii i z wyjątkiem tych ostatnich kilku miesięcy pracowałem tylko zdalnie. Wszyscy oprócz mnie, z tego co wiem, dostali jakieś aneksy dotyczące pracy zdalnej w tym roku, ja nie.\n\nJeżeli nie można zrobić absolutnie nic, chciałbym żeby firma całkowicie mnie zwolniła, najlepiej bez okresu wypowiedzenia, tak żebym znalazł sobie inną pracę zdalną lub bliżej domu, bo aktualnie z powodu odległości do biura wcale nie mam prywatnego życia, poza weekendami praktycznie cały czas schodzi na pracę i dojazdy do odległego biura. W jaki najlepiej sposób najlepiej byłoby poprowadzić taką rozmowę, żeby to osiągnąć?\n\nSam złożyć wypowiedzenia nie mogę, bo żeby to zrobić rozumiem że musiałbym *wcześniej* znaleźć inną pracę, a aktualnie nikt (na razie 7 firm podało taki powód) mnie nie chce z powodu zbyt długiego okresu wypowiedzenia w aktualnej firmie. A gdy zapytałem o możliwość zawarcia aneksu skracającego okres wypowiedzenia, usłyszałem że nie ma takiej możliwości, że w momencie zatrudniania zgodziłem się na takie a nie inne warunki i nie ma możliwości ich zmiany.', 'role': 'user'}],

prompt: [{'content': 'Опиши как достичь осознанного сноведения', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'Ответ написан полностью на русском языке без включения других языков.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'В ответе дано чёткое определение осознанного сновидения как состояния, в котором человек осознаёт, что спит, и может влиять на сюжет сна.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Указано, что результаты практики индивидуальны, требуют времени и не обещаются быстрые или гарантированные осознанные сны.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Описаны рекомендации по длительности (7‑9\u202fч), регулярности, отказу от алкоголя/тяжелой пищи и минимизации использования гаджетов перед сном.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Требуется сразу после пробуждения записывать все детали сна, включая «не помню», и отмечать повторяющиеся мотивы или маркеры.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Объяснено, что такое типичные повторяющиеся элементы сна (места, ситуации, странности) и как их использовать для входа в осознанность.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Описан метод регулярных проверок реальности в течение дня с настоящим сомнением, без механического выполнения.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Приведены конкретные примеры проверок: осмотр рук, чтение текста/часов, дыхание через зажатый нос и др.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Перед сном формулируется намерение осознать сон, используется повторяющаяся фраза и мысленное «переигрывание» последнего сна.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Рекомендовано проснуться после 4,5‑6\u202fч сна, бодрствовать короткое время, сосредоточившись на осознанном сне, затем снова лечь спать.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Описан прямой вход в сон: сохранение осознанности при засыпании, наблюдение гипнагогии и переход в образ без потери сознания.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Указано, что сонный паралич может возникать при практике, является безопасным и способы выхода – движение пальцев или языка.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'После осознания сна перечислены действия для удержания: растирание ладоней, вращение, голосовые команды, фокус на деталях.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Рекомендовано начинать с простых изменений (цвет, мелкие объекты, освещение) и логичных объяснений их появления.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Указано, что переход к полётам, телепортации и радикальному изменению сюжета должен происходить постепенно по мере устойчивости ОС.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Предупреждено о рисках при тревожных, панических или психотических состояниях; при дискомфорте рекомендуется сократить или прекратить практику.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Отмечено, что практика не рекомендуется людям с психическими расстройствами (шизофрения, психозы) или нестабильным психическим состоянием.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Подчёркнуто, что при нормальном состоянии ОС не вредны, но недосып, изматывающие практики и ухудшение самочувствия недопустимы.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Рекомендовано не превращать практику в стресс или навязчивость и не жертвовать качеством сна ради экспериментов.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
