prompt: [{'content': '我是一名大学生党员，毕业后会进入江北区政府工作，对自己的未来写一份', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '文中明确写明作者是大学生党员、即将毕业并将进入江北区政府工作，且将身份与未来规划紧密关联。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '整篇稿件为完整、正式的“未来规划/发展设想”文章，非提纲、心得或问答式内容。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '开头包含正式标题并在首段交代写作背景、人生节点及写作目的。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '正文采用编号或章节标识（如“一、二、三”），段落层次分明，逻辑顺序清晰。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文使用正式、庄重、书面化的中文表达，无网络用语、口语或随意词汇。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中包含对理想信念、党性修养及学习党的创新理论的具体规划与自我要求。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '所有政治表述与现行路线政策保持一致，未出现违背党和国家基本方针的内容。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中体现从大学生到党政机关工作人员的角色转换意识，并列出适应岗位、尽快胜任的具体打算。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中提出围绕政府岗位和科室职责的业务学习计划，具体包括文字写作、协调沟通、政策学习等。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中明确写明严格遵守政治纪律、组织纪律和机关规章制度，并提出强化规矩意识的具体要求。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中强调从小事做起、脚踏实地、敢于吃苦、注重实践锻炼的务实作风要求。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中结合江北区实际，提出服务江北区经济社会发展、围绕中心工作、融入大局的具体打算。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中突出以人民为中心理念，阐述服务群众、关注民生、回应群众诉求的态度和举措。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中包含坚守廉洁自律、遵守八项规定精神和拒腐防变的明确表态及未来要求。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中对短期、中期、长期发展设定清晰的阶段性目标，并说明逐步成长的路径。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文中提出持续学习、更新知识、参加培训、用新理论和新知识指导实践的长期学习规划。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '在总体政治方向一致前提下，文中适度结合作者专业或拟任岗位，体现一定个性化内容。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文论点前后一致，无自相矛盾，论述顺畅，具因果或递进关系。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文章篇幅完整，包含多段展开说明，信息充实，未出现仅几句简单表态的情况。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '结尾有凝练的总结语，对责任使命、人生价值或“不负组织培养”等进行升华。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt: [{'content': 'Describe 8 ranked hierarchy: Oligarchical CEOs, administrators, moderators, creators/editors, commenters, starters, lurkers, invisiblers (many are rebellious). Lurkers and invisiblers are inner worlders.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The response explicitly names and provides a description for each of the eight ranks: Oligarchical CEOs, administrators, moderators, creators/editors, commenters, starters, lurkers, and invisiblers.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'The response explicitly describes lurkers as inner worlders, emphasizing their observational or silent role.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explicitly describes invisiblers as inner worlders, noting their reduced visibility compared to lurkers.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "Both lurkers and invisiblers are explicitly classified as 'inner worlders' in the response.", 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The description of invisiblers characterizes them as rebellious, subversive, or resistant to the system.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response groups the ranks into upper (CEOs/administrators/moderators), middle (creators/editors/commenters/starters), and lower inner‑world (lurkers/invisiblers) layers and explains how each group functions.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response describes at least one dynamic relationship between adjacent levels (e.g., decision cascade, pressure, disruption).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Any interpretive assumptions about the setting are explicitly noted rather than presented as facts.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response uses a clear structured format (e.g., numbered list 1‑8 with headings) to present each rank.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response employs visual formatting such as bold headers or bullet points to separate each rank.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Each rank description is concise but includes concrete, role‑specific details without unnecessary digressions.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response maintains a clear, explanatory, non‑hostile tone throughout.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The hierarchy is interpreted within the context of an online community, digital platform, or social‑media ecosystem.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response clearly distinguishes the distinct power dynamics of CEOs (ownership/agenda), administrators (technical/bureaucratic control), and moderators (enforcement/policing).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response clearly differentiates creators/editors (value generation), commenters (reaction/validation), and starters (low‑stakes initiation).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response distinguishes lurkers as passive consumers providing metrics from invisiblers as actors employing privacy or avoidance measures.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Each rank description includes an analysis of its specific role and the power dynamics it holds within the system.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response must use Markdown level‑3 headings (###) for each rank, numbered 1‑8, and bold the sub‑sections (e.g., **Role:**, **Power Dynamic:**). No plain‑text lists are allowed.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For every rank the description must contain a line that begins exactly with "**Role:**" followed by a concise statement of the primary activity.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For every rank the description must contain a line that begins exactly with "**Power Dynamic:**" (case‑sensitive) describing the type and scope of power.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The heading for the Lurker rank must be formatted as "### <number>. Lurkers (Inner Worlders)" (including the parentheses and exact phrase "Inner Worlders").', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The heading for the Invisibler rank must be formatted as "### <number>. Invisiblers (Inner Worlders)" (including the parentheses and exact phrase "Inner Worlders").', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt: [{'content': 'A 4-year-old girl presents to the pediatrician\\u2019s office for a physical examination prior to starting preschool. She was born at 39 weeks gestation via spontaneous vaginal delivery. She is up to date on all vaccines and is meeting all developmental milestones. Past medical history is noncontributory. She takes no medications but does take a chewable vitamin daily. She lives with her parents and older brother in a house. Today, her blood pressure is 110/65 mm Hg, heart rate is 90/min, respiratory rate is 22/min, and temperature of 37.0\\u00b0C (98.6\\u00b0F). On physical exam, she appears well developed and pleasant. She sits listening to the conversation and follows directions. Palpation of the heart reveals a mild parasternal heave. Auscultation reveals a normal S1 but the S2 is split and remains split during inhalation and exhalation. Additionally, there is a medium pitched midsystolic murmur that is loudest between ribs 2 and 3 on the left side and a very soft diastolic rumble. Which of the following congenital defects is the most likely cause of these findings?  option a: Atrial septal defect; option b: Coarctation of the aorta; option c: Patent ductus arteriosus; option d: Tetralogy of Fallot', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'Response explicitly identifies option a (Atrial septal defect) as the correct congenital defect.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response explicitly identifies a fixed, wide split S2 (splitting that persists during both inspiration and expiration) as a key physical exam finding.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response explains that the fixed split S2 is caused by left‑to‑right atrial shunting leading to right‑ventricular volume overload, which delays pulmonic valve closure independent of respiration.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response states that the midsystolic murmur heard at the left upper sternal border is due to increased flow across the pulmonic valve (relative pulmonic stenosis) and explicitly notes it is not caused by flow through the septal defect.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response attributes the soft diastolic rumble to increased blood flow across the tricuspid valve (functional tricuspid stenosis) during diastole.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response links the palpable parasternal heave to right‑ventricular dilation or hypertrophy resulting from chronic volume overload due to the ASD.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response rules out coarctation (option b) by stating that there is no upper‑to‑lower extremity blood pressure gradient, no delayed femoral pulses, and that murmur location is inconsistent.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response rules out PDA (option c) by noting the absence of a continuous machinery‑like murmur and lack of bounding pulses.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response rules out tetralogy of Fallot (option d) by indicating the patient is acyanotic, has a split S2 (whereas TOF typically has a single S2), and lacks a harsh right‑ventricular outflow murmur.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response acknowledges that the child’s age (4\u202fyears), asymptomatic status, normal development, and well appearance are consistent with a typical presentation of ASD.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response accurately describes ASD pathophysiology as a left‑to‑right atrial shunt causing chronic right‑sided volume overload and delayed pulmonic valve closure.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response states the diagnosis clearly and early (e.g., “The correct answer is: Atrial septal defect”) before detailed reasoning.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response organizes the explanation into clearly separated points or numbered paragraphs.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response uses precise cardiology terms such as “fixed split S2,” “left‑to‑right shunt,” “right‑ventricular volume overload,” and “flow murmur” correctly.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response explicitly addresses each option (a–d), providing comparative reasoning for why the incorrect choices are less likely.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response provides sufficient detail to justify the chosen diagnosis and exclude others without unnecessary digression.', 'points': 3, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response explicitly identifies the defect as an ostium secundum atrial septal defect.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response explicitly describes the soft diastolic rumble as a functional tricuspid stenosis caused by increased flow across the tricuspid valve.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response states the diagnosis (Atrial septal defect) in a single sentence at the very start of the answer before any reasoning.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response explicitly states that the midsystolic murmur is a pulmonic flow murmur due to increased right‑ventricular output and explicitly notes it is not caused by turbulence through the septal defect.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response provides at least two distinct physical‑exam or hemodynamic findings that directly contradict each of the three incorrect options (coarctation, PDA, TOF).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt: [{'content': 'what is the engineering difference in the Tesla battery vs normal lithium ION batteries?', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The response explicitly compares Tesla batteries to normal lithium‑ion batteries, stating at least one engineering difference.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response identifies Tesla’s cylindrical cell formats (e.g., 18650, 2170, 4680) and contrasts them with typical lithium‑ion formats (e.g., pouch, prismatic) and links format to power capability or packaging.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response describes the 4680 tabless design and its engineering impacts such as reduced current path length, lower internal resistance, and decreased heat generation.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response lists Tesla’s primary chemistries (NCA, high‑Ni NMC, LFP) and contrasts them with common chemistries used in standard lithium‑ion batteries, noting differences in energy density, cost, or cycle life.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explains how Tesla tunes the state‑of‑charge window, voltage limits, or additives to extend cycle life compared to typical consumer‑device lithium‑ion batteries.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response details Tesla’s liquid thermal management system (including active heating/cooling) and contrasts it with the minimal or passive thermal management used in typical lithium‑ion applications.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response outlines Tesla’s advanced BMS features (fine‑grained sensing, SOC/SOH modeling, OTA updates) and notes that typical lithium‑ion packs use more basic monitoring or balancing.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response describes Tesla’s pack architecture, including modules and structural packs that contribute to vehicle stiffness, and contrasts with non‑structural, modular packs used elsewhere.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response mentions engineering of busbars, current collectors, potting, and mechanical fixation in Tesla packs that reduce resistance and improve crash robustness, distinguishing from generic pack designs.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response enumerates safety layers in Tesla packs (cell/group/pack protections, thermal propagation mitigation, crash‑optimized enclosures) and contrasts them with safety measures in typical small‑device lithium‑ion packs.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response states that Tesla batteries are optimized for EV requirements (high power, range, fast charge, long cycle life) versus consumer devices optimized for thinness, cost, and moderate life.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explicitly clarifies that Tesla batteries use lithium‑ion chemistry and are not a fundamentally different battery type.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response is organized into clear sections or bullet points separating topics such as cell format, chemistry, thermal management, BMS, pack architecture, and safety.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response provides sufficient technical detail without unnecessary digressions, avoiding overly terse one‑line answers or excessive unrelated background.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response acknowledges the definition of “normal lithium‑ion” (e.g., consumer electronics or other EVs) or states the baseline being used.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response uses correct battery terminology (e.g., NCA, NMC, LFP, SEI, SOC, SOH, cylindrical, pouch, prismatic) without technical errors.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response maintains an explanatory, neutral tone, presenting trade‑offs without marketing language or unsubstantiated superiority claims.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response states that Tesla batteries operate on the same lithium‑ion electrochemical principles as standard batteries, not a different chemistry.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response identifies Tesla’s exclusive use of cylindrical cells (18650, 2170, 4680) and contrasts this with the pouch or prismatic cells common in other EVs and electronics.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explains the 4680 tabless electrode design and notes its effect of reducing electrical path length, internal resistance, and heat generation.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response describes Tesla’s side‑cooling “snake” ribbon thermal architecture and contrasts it with traditional bottom‑plate cooling.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response details how Tesla’s cells are bonded/glued to become part of the vehicle’s structure, forming a structural battery pack, versus conventional module‑to‑pack hierarchies.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response discusses Tesla’s specific chemistries (e.g., NCA vs. LFP) and the role of its BMS in managing voltage curves and volatility, contrasting with typical BMS approaches.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response mentions Tesla’s dry electrode coating process and explains how it differs from conventional wet slurry coating.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explains the engineering rationale behind Tesla’s design choices, citing benefits such as cost reduction, increased vehicle stiffness, safety improvements, or higher energy density.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "The response must explicitly describe Tesla's dry electrode coating manufacturing technique, contrast it with the conventional wet slurry process, and state the engineering benefits (e.g., reduced energy use, thicker electrodes, cost impact).", 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "The response must provide a numeric comparison of the electrical path length (or resistance) before and after Tesla's tabless electrode design, e.g., stating that the path is reduced from hundreds of millimetres to tens of millimetres or giving a specific percentage reduction.", 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response must name the wavy‑tube "snake" cooling ribbon, describe its placement (glued to the side of each cylindrical cell), and explain how its geometry increases coolant‑cell contact area compared to flat plate cooling.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response must detail the use of structural epoxy (or equivalent bonding material) to glue individual cells directly into the pack casing, explain its mechanical role in making the pack a load‑bearing vehicle structure, and note how this differs from module‑based assemblies.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For each of the four major subsystems (cell format, chemistry, thermal management, pack architecture) the response must list at least three distinct engineering trade‑offs and state why Tesla’s chosen solution is preferred over a "normal" lithium‑ion baseline.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt: [{'content': '手首の光学モデルについておしえてください。', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The response addresses only the optical model of the wrist and does not discuss other body parts or unrelated topics.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response clearly defines what a wrist optical model is and states its intended computational or simulation purpose.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response acknowledges that the question covers a broad scope (e.g., visible to near‑infrared propagation) and explicitly states the assumed wavelength range.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response enumerates the anatomical layers of the wrist (epidermis, dermis, subcutaneous fat, muscle, blood vessels, bone) and explains that the model treats them as distinct optical layers.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'For each listed layer, the response provides the characteristic absorption and scattering behavior, mentioning key chromophores such as melanin and hemoglobin.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response supplies typical thickness values or depth ranges for each layer (e.g., epidermis\u202f≈\u202f0.1\u202fmm, dermis\u202f≈\u202f1–2\u202fmm, etc.).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response describes at least one geometric representation of the wrist (e.g., multilayer planar model or 3D volumetric mesh).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response defines the optical parameters μa, μs, g, and n and explains their role in the model.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response states that the optical parameters vary with wavelength and outlines the general trend for each tissue in the visible‑near‑infrared range.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response cites at least one peer‑reviewed source or database from which numerical values are obtained.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response lists at least three common light‑transport modeling approaches (e.g., Monte\u202fCarlo, diffusion approximation, radiative‑transfer equation solvers).', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response outlines the basic steps of a Monte\u202fCarlo photon‑tracking simulation, notes its advantages for wrist modeling, and mentions a known implementation (e.g., MCML, MCX).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response specifies the scattering‑dominant conditions under which diffusion approximation is valid and notes its inaccuracy near tissue boundaries.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response identifies wrist‑specific anatomical features (e.g., radial artery location, shallow bone) and explains how they affect optical modeling.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response describes how arteries are modeled as high‑absorption cylindrical structures and how veins or capillaries are represented in the background.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explains how pulsatile changes are incorporated (e.g., time‑varying μa or vessel diameter).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response discusses variability due to skin tone, subcutaneous fat thickness, age, or gender and mentions the concept of subject‑specific models.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response lists at least two practical applications of wrist optical models (e.g., PPG sensor design, SpO₂ estimation, near‑infrared imaging).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response includes at least one fundamental equation (e.g., Beer‑Lambert law) and states its relevance to the model.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response enumerates at least two limitations of the model (e.g., averaging assumptions, neglect of sweat or hair).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response is organized with clear headings and/or numbered sections and uses bullet points to present information in a logical order.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response presents technical terms with both Japanese and English equivalents (e.g., 表皮 / epidermis).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response identifies any missing assumptions (e.g., intended wavelength or application) and asks a clarifying question when needed.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response states that the wrist optical model is used for simulating light‑tissue interaction in wearable PPG or related devices.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response mentions both computational (mathematical) models and physical phantom models for the wrist.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response defines the wrist cross‑section as layers (epidermis, dermis, subcutaneous tissue, bone) and provides a brief characteristic for each.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explains the physical principles of absorption and scattering in tissue and identifies the corresponding coefficients.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response identifies hemoglobin (oxy‑ and deoxy‑) and melanin as the primary absorbers in wrist tissue.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response relates specific wavelength bands (green, red, near‑infrared) to their typical uses in wrist PPG or SpO₂ measurement.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response mentions at least one simulation technique (e.g., Monte\u202fCarlo) and briefly describes its workflow.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response lists practical measurement challenges such as motion artifacts, skin‑type variability, and individual differences.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Response must explicitly define all four optical parameters μa (absorption coefficient), μs (scattering coefficient), g (anisotropy factor), and n (refractive index) and state the specific role of each in light‑tissue interaction.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt:
[{'content': 'Your task is to summarize excerpts from a transcript of a group coaching session.
NAME_1 is the speaker and leader of the group and the participants are named NAME_2 NAME_3 and NAME_4.

Please briefly summarize the following section in English, but please do so without the words "In this section"

[NAME_1]:
"Welcome here in our round. NAME_5 is with us again today as a silent observer and has also started the recording directly.
We may manage to put the videos in the section again soon.
Up to now everyone of you was always there. There was no reason. But we are in the process of setting up the area so that the videos can be found on the e-learning platform.
NAME_5 is technically savvy. He may also try to use artificial intelligence to script the videos and then organize a summary.
We'll see what the quality of that is then. But I have no idea if I'm interested in that yet out of interest. I have no idea how to do that, but I think it's awesome if it actually works."

Please be as brief as possible and write no more than two sentences.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The summary is written entirely in English with no words from other languages.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response contains no more than two sentences.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The phrase "In this section" does not appear anywhere in the answer.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary states that NAME_5 may use artificial intelligence to script or summarize the videos.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary conveys the essential information while using the fewest possible words.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary excludes irrelevant details such as the speaker’s personal uncertainty or lack of technical knowledge.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'NAME_1 is identified as the group leader/speaker and NAME_5 as a silent observer.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Actions are correctly attributed: NAME_1 is speaking/leading, NAME_5 is handling technical tasks and recording.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary mentions that NAME_5 is recording the session.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary notes that NAME_1 welcomes the group and that NAME_5 is recording for the e‑learning platform.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary indicates that videos will be made available on an e‑learning platform.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary reflects NAME_1’s uncertainty about the quality of the AI‑generated output.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary contains only information present in the transcript excerpt, without added interpretations.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary is coherent and logically condenses the main points of the excerpt.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary is written in a neutral, descriptive tone without judgmental or emotional language.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary contains the exact phrase "silent observer" attached to NAME_5.', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary includes the substring "may use AI" (case‑exact) when describing NAME_5\'s AI activity.', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The summary explicitly conveys NAME_1\'s uncertainty or curiosity about the AI‑generated output, using words such as "curiosity", "wonder", "not sure", or the phrase "how well this will work".', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt: [{'content': '¿Qué variable aleatoria es? Un estudio de mercado indica que el tiempo medio que un cliente pasa en una tienda es de 25 minutos.', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'Indica explícitamente que la variable aleatoria que representa el tiempo que un cliente pasa en la tienda es continua y no discreta.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Asigna un símbolo (por ejemplo, T) a la variable aleatoria que modela el tiempo de permanencia del cliente.', 'points': 4, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Explica que el tiempo puede tomar cualquier valor real dentro de un intervalo positivo, justificando que la variable es continua.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Menciona que la magnitud medida es el tiempo que un cliente pasa en la tienda y la relaciona con la variable aleatoria definida.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Indica que los 25 minutos corresponden a la media (esperanza matemática) de la variable aleatoria de tiempo.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'No confunde la media con moda, mediana u otro parámetro y no clasifica erróneamente el tiempo como variable discreta u ordinal.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'La respuesta es breve, directa y sin información innecesaria respecto a la pregunta.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Utiliza terminología estadística correcta en español (p.ej., ‘variable aleatoria continua’, ‘esperanza’, ‘media’).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Declara que la variable aleatoria del tiempo sigue una distribución exponencial, fundamentando la elección en el contexto.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Calcula λ como el inverso de la media proporcionada (λ = 1/25 = 0.04) y lo muestra explícitamente.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Explica que la distribución exponencial es apropiada para tiempos de servicio o espera cuando sólo se conoce la media y los eventos son independientes.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Escribe la función de densidad de probabilidad con el parámetro calculado: f(x)=0.04\u202fe^{‑0.04x} para x≥0.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Discute por qué no se utiliza una distribución normal (p.ej., soporte no negativo, asimetría) o menciona la propiedad de falta de memoria de la exponencial.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Declara que la variable sigue una distribución exponencial, muestra la fórmula de densidad f(x)=λ\u202fe^{-λx} con λ calculado como 1/25\u202f=\u202f0.04, y explica la suposición de falta de memoria como fundamento.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Calcula λ = 1/μ con μ\u202f=\u202f25, muestra λ con al menos dos decimales (0.04) y verifica que E[X]=1/λ coincide exactamente con 25 minutos.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Escribe la función de densidad completa, incluye el dominio x\u202f≥\u202f0 y utiliza notación LaTeX correcta (p.ej., \\[ f(x)=0.04 e^{-0.04x},\\; x\\ge 0 \\]).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Menciona al menos una distribución alternativa (p.ej., normal) y argumenta explícitamente por qué no es adecuada dadas las características del tiempo (soporte no negativo, sesgo positivo).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Define un símbolo (X o T) al inicio, lo utiliza en al menos dos expresiones matemáticas diferentes (p.ej., f(x) y E[X]) y mantiene la misma notación a lo largo de toda la respuesta.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Incluye una referencia explícita a la relación entre la distribución exponencial y procesos de Poisson o teoría de colas como justificación del modelo.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Organiza la respuesta en secciones numeradas (1., 2., …) y presenta cada ecuación en bloques LaTeX separados, garantizando claridad estructural.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

       {'criterion': 'Discute por qué no se utiliza una distribución normal (p.ej., soporte no negativo, asimetría) o menciona la propiedad de falta de memoria de la exponencial.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Declara que la variable sigue una distribución exponencial, muestra la fórmula de densidad f(x)=λ\u202fe^{-λx} con λ calculado como 1/25\u202f=\u202f0.04, y explica la suposición de falta de memoria como fundamento.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Calcula λ = 1/μ con μ\u202f=\u202f25, muestra λ con al menos dos decimales (0.04) y verifica que E[X]=1/λ coincide exactamente con 25 minutos.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Escribe la función de densidad completa, incluye el dominio x\u202f≥\u202f0 y utiliza notación LaTeX correcta (p.ej., \\[ f(x)=0.04 e^{-0.04x},\\; x\\ge 0 \\]).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Menciona al menos una distribución alternativa (p.ej., normal) y argumenta explícitamente por qué no es adecuada dadas las características del tiempo (soporte no negativo, sesgo positivo).', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Define un símbolo (X o T) al inicio, lo utiliza en al menos dos expresiones matemáticas diferentes (p.ej., f(x) y E[X]) y mantiene la misma notación a lo largo de toda la respuesta.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Incluye una referencia explícita a la relación entre la distribución exponencial y procesos de Poisson o teoría de colas como justificación del modelo.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Organiza la respuesta en secciones numeradas (1., 2., …) y presenta cada ecuación en bloques LaTeX separados, garantizando claridad estructural.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}}

prompt: [{'content': '请根据以下文本写一篇1500字左右的分析报告：从调查中发现，所调查英语专业人士中大学生占绝大多数，七成左右为女生，65%的人的日常工作会涉及到翻译。在第四题中，有80%的被调查者认为机器翻译在需要根据文化背景和语境进行翻译的情境下表现较差，45%认为机器翻译的创造性翻译表现较差，40%认为机器翻译面对复杂的语言结构和长句子翻译时表现较差。第五题中，关于人工翻译缺点的五个选项占比相差不大，都在五成左右，其中认为需要专业知识和技能为人工翻译缺点的认同者最多。第六题中，只有极少数人认为机器翻译不会带来负面影响，而70%被调查者认为机器翻译会导致文化差异误解，接近半数的人认为会导致语言多样性受损和会导致隐私泄露等安全性问题。第七题中，被调查者通常会在书籍阅读、日常交流与国际旅行和商品包装与广告的情境下选择机器翻译，而在隐私性文件、专业性文件与国际商务交流中不会选择机器翻译。第八题中，58%被调查者经常机器翻译而非人工翻译，24%经常人工翻译而非机器翻译，仅有17%和0.97%会分别选择全部机器翻译和全部人工翻译。第九题中，六成左右被调查者认为机器翻译服务可以满足需求，四成则认为不能。第十题中，17%被调查者认为机器翻译的普及不会对人工翻译造成威胁，持相反意见的被调查者中22%认为机器翻译会替代人工翻译，而60%认为机器翻译对人工翻译的威胁并不大。第十一题中，34%被调查者认为机器翻译将成为主要翻译方式，39%认为人工翻译仍将是主要翻译方式，27%认为机器翻译与人工翻译前景相当。第十二题中，有被调查者提出观点“合作”、“机器翻译的技术需要掌握，但人工翻译的水平和质量需要持续提升”。', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '全文使用中文撰写，字数在1200至1800之间（约1500字±20%），且不出现英文单词或句子。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '文章以正式、学术化的分析报告形式呈现，而非仅列出原始问卷数据或个人随笔。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '正文分为引言、主体若干章节、结论三大部分，段落层次分明，逻辑顺序清晰。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '报告包含标题、摘要、引言、正文（含至少两个小节）、结论与建议六个必备章节。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '准确引用调查对象为以大学生为主的英语专业人士，说明女性占约70%，65%从事翻译相关工作，并分析这些特征对结果的可能影响。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '使用Q4数据（80%文化语境差、45%创造性差、40%复杂结构差）逐项分析机器翻译的不足，并解释其对实际翻译任务的影响。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '在报告中正确呈现Q4的三项比例（80%、45%、40%），且数值与原始数据完全一致。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '引用Q5各选项约50%比例，重点说明‘需要专业知识和技能’被认同最多，并分析该缺点对人工翻译成本和门槛的意义。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '依据Q6数据（70%担忧文化误解，约50%担忧语言多样性受损及隐私泄露），阐述机器翻译可能带来的负面影响并提出相应风险意识。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '明确列出机器翻译适用的情境（书籍阅读、日常交流、国际旅行、商品包装与广告）以及人工翻译更适合的情境（隐私文件、专业文件、国际商务交流），并说明原因。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '使用Q8比例（58%经常使用机器翻译，24%经常使用人工翻译，17%全部机器翻译，0.97%全部人工翻译）分析用户的使用频率及机器与人工翻译的组合模式。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '在报告中准确呈现Q8的四项比例，且数值与原始数据完全一致。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '依据Q9约60%满意、40%不满意的结果，区分对日常需求满足与对高质量专业需求不满足的原因进行解释。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '结合Q9满意度与Q10威胁感知数据（17%无威胁，22%认为会替代，60%认为威胁不大），评估受访者对机器翻译的整体满意度及其对人工翻译的威胁感知。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '基于Q10数据，分析受访者对机器翻译可能替代人工翻译的程度，区分完全替代、有限替代和无显著威胁的观点。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '使用Q11比例（34%机器翻译为主，39%人工翻译为主，27%两者并存）讨论三种未来翻译格局的可能性及其背后逻辑。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '引用Q12中‘合作’及‘机器翻译技术需要掌握，人工翻译水平需提升’的观点，阐述人机协同的可能模式及其对行业的启示。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '在未直接给出数据的分析中使用‘可能’、‘可以推测’等限定语标明推断，避免将推断表述为事实。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '报告中所有百分比和关键数值（如70%、80%等）均与原始文本完全一致，无误差。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '除复述数据外，报告提供原因分析、实际情境关联及对翻译实践的深层解释，展示对技术发展趋势的理解。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '报告对机器翻译和人工翻译的优势与劣势评价保持中立，不出现单方面贬低或神化的表述。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '适度使用‘语境’、‘跨文化交际’、‘创造性翻译’、‘人机协同’等专业术语，且使用准确、不过度堆砌。', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '在结论部分归纳主要发现，并提出对翻译学习、教育或行业发展的具体启示。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '基于分析给出针对学生、从业者或技术开发者的可操作性建议，且建议具备实现可能性。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '全文行文流畅、正式，无口语化表达、语法错误或错别字。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '报告必须以 Markdown 一级标题（#）呈现完整标题，随后必须紧跟二级标题（## 摘要）并提供150±20字的中文摘要，摘要后必须空行再进入正文。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '报告必须包含名为‘结论与建议’的二级标题（## 结论与建议），并在该章节内分别设立三个三级标题（### 针对学生、### 针对开发者、### 针对教育机构），每个标题下至少列出两条以‘-’开头的具体可操作建议。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '报告所有章节层级必须统一使用 Markdown 语法（#、##、###），且不得出现阿拉伯数字编号的章节标题。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '报告中每一次出现的调查百分比必须以‘X%’形式出现，数值必须与原始文本完全一致（包括小数点后零位），并且在句末使用全角句号。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

prompt: [{'content': '如何催付款 发票', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': '答案明确聚焦于“如何催付款/发票”，未出现与主题无关的内容。', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案列出在催款前需核对的合同、付款条件、发票信息、收票确认以及准备对账单、合同编号等资料。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案说明检查合同中的付款条款、付款节点、逾期责任，并核对发票抬头、金额、税率、开票日期是否与合同一致。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案提及确认对方已收到并确认发票的方式，如快递签收、邮件回执或对账确认。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案给出从温和到正式的催款渠道和顺序建议，例如微信/邮件 → 电话 → 正式函件 → 律师函。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案强调使用礼貌、专业的语气，先了解对方流程困难，再提出付款期限和责任。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案提供适用于刚到期或刚逾期的首次催款文案，包含项目/合同、发票信息、建议付款时间等可直接套用内容。', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案提供针对已逾期一段时间的催款模板，语气略正式，并要求对方反馈预计付款日期。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案给出多次催款未付时的文案，引用合同条款、逾期责任，设定最后期限并提示可能采取的措施。', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案说明电话催款的开场、进度提问、是否需补资料以及适度强调合同和资金压力的要点。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案根据工程款/大额款、日常往来、内部报销等不同情形，提供对应的催款方式或严谨程度建议。', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案针对“发票有问题”“流程慢”等常见阻碍，给出具体应对措施，如更正发票、要求明确时间点。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': '答案提醒保留催款记录、对账单等证据，并在大额长期拖欠时建议咨询律师、发送律师函或启动诉讼/仲裁。', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt: [{'content': 'مقالة عن لعبة limbo', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'المقال مكتوب بالكامل باللغة العربية الفصحى دون أي كلمات أو عبارات بلغة أخرى.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال مقسّم إلى فقرات مترابطة تشكل بنية مقالية متماسكة (مقدمة، جسم، خاتمة).', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يحتوي على فقرة افتتاحية تشرح باختصار ما هي لعبة Limbo وأهميتها العامة في عالم الألعاب.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر اسم المطور (Playdead)، سنة الإصدار التقريبية، وأبرز المنصات التي صدرت عليها اللعبة.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يصف الأسلوب البصري للعبة باللونين الأبيض والأسود، استخدام الظلال والضباب، والجو الكئيب/الكابوسي، مع غياب التفاصيل اللونية المعقدة.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يشير إلى غموض قصة اللعبة، غياب الحوارات والنصوص المباشرة، واعتماد السرد على البيئة لتفسير القصة.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يوضح الإطار القصصي الأساسي: فتى في عالم Limbo يبحث عن أخته، مع معالجة مواضيع الموت والخوف والوحدة، مع إقرار بعدم وجود تفاصيل رسمية مؤكدة.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يبيّن أن اللعبة من نوع Puzzle-Platformer ثنائي الأبعاد، ويصف الحركة الأساسية والتقدم الأفقي والتفاعل مع البيئة.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر أن الألغاز تعتمد على عناصر فيزيائية مثل الوزن، الحركة، الجاذبية، ويشرح تدرّج الصعوبة.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يصف وجود أفخاخ وأعداء ومخاطر قاتلة، وأن الموت يحدث بشكل مفاجئ ومتكرر ويُستغل كآلية تعلم مع نقاط إعادة قريبة.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يؤكد قلة الموسيقى، الاعتماد على الصمت النسبي والأصوات المحيطة الدقيقة، ودور ذلك في بناء التوتر والجو الغامض.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يوضح أن اللعبة تعتمد على الحد الأدنى من الشرح وتثق بقدرة اللاعب على الاستنتاج دون تعليمات مباشرة.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يتضمن قراءة رمزية لرحلة الفتى كصراع وجودي مع الموت والخسارة والمجهول، مع توضيح أن هذه التفسيرات ليست رسمية وحيدة.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يشير إلى أن نهاية اللعبة مفتوحة للتأويل، ويذكر بعض التساؤلات أو القراءات المحتملة دون الجزم بإجابة واحدة.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يعلق على ذكاء تصميم المراحل، التعليم التدريجي للميكانيكيات، ويذكر مدة اللعب المتوقعة دون إطالة غير ضرورية.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر تأثير Limbo على الألعاب المستقلة، الجوائز أو التقدير النقدي الذي حصلت عليه، وإسهامها في إبراز الألعاب كوسيط فني.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال ينتقل بسلاسة من تعريف اللعبة إلى أسلوبها الفني واللعب ثم التحليل والتقييم دون قفزات غير مفسَّرة.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يحتوي على خاتمة تجمع العناصر الرئيسة وتقدّم حكمًا عامًا على اللعبة وأهميتها أو ما يميز تجربتها.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يقدم معلومات صحيحة ومعروفة عن اللعبة، ويتجنب اختلاق تفاصيل أو نسب آراء شخصية إلى المطور كحقائق.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يستخدم لغة عربية سليمة، جمل مفهومة دون حشو مفرط، مع تنويع المفردات المناسب لمقال تحليلي عن لعبة فنية.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر اسم المطور (Playdead)، سنة الإصدار (2010)، ويصنّف اللعبة كإحدى الألعاب المستقلة (Indie).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يصف اعتماد اللعبة على التدرج الرمادي (أبيض وأسود)، استخدام الظلال (Silhouettes)، وتأثير حبة الفيلم (Film Grain).', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يشرح حبكة الفتى الباحث عن أخته، ويشير إلى غياب الحوارات، وغموض المعنى والنهاية.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يوضح تصنيف اللعبة (Puzzle-Platformer)، الاعتماد على الألغاز الفيزيائية، ومبدأ التجربة المتكررة والموت (Trial and Death).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يشير إلى غياب الموسيقى التقليدية واعتماد الأصوات البيئية والصمت لتعزيز الرعب والتوتر.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر تأثير اللعبة على صناعة الألعاب المستقلة أو يشير إلى ألعاب مشابهة مثل Inside و Little Nightmares.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال مقسّم بشكل منظم يشمل مقدمة، عناوين فرعية للجوانب المختلفة، وخاتمة تلخص التجربة.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'يجب أن يحتوي المقال على عناوين فرعية بصيغة Markdown (###) لكل قسم رئيسي مطلوب: الأسلوب البصري والجو العام، القصة والسرد الصامت، أسلوب اللعب، التصميم الصوتي، التأثير والإرث، والخاتمة.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'في كل قسم رئيسي يجب تضمين قائمة نقطية (بدءًا بـ * أو -) تحتوي على نقطتين فرعيتين على الأقل توضح تفاصيل القسم.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'يجب وجود قسم بعنوان ### المنصات يتضمن قائمة نقطية صريحة بجميع المنصات الرسمية للعبة Limbo (Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, PC, Switch, iOS, Android).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'يجب أن يتضمن المقال عنوانًا فرعيًا واضحًا ### الخاتمة يكون منفصلًا عن باقي الأقسام ولا يدمج مع نص القسم السابق.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'يجب أن تكون عناوين الأقسام مرقمة بصيغة "### 1. العنوان"، "### 2. العنوان" … بحيث يظهر رقم الفقرة قبل اسم القسم.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],

       {'criterion': 'المقال يبيّن أن اللعبة من نوع Puzzle-Platformer ثنائي الأبعاد، ويصف الحركة الأساسية والتقدم الأفقي والتفاعل مع البيئة.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر أن الألغاز تعتمد على عناصر فيزيائية مثل الوزن، الحركة، الجاذبية، ويشرح تدرّج الصعوبة.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يصف وجود أفخاخ وأعداء ومخاطر قاتلة، وأن الموت يحدث بشكل مفاجئ ومتكرر ويُستغل كآلية تعلم مع نقاط إعادة قريبة.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يؤكد قلة الموسيقى، الاعتماد على الصمت النسبي والأصوات المحيطة الدقيقة، ودور ذلك في بناء التوتر والجو الغامض.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يوضح أن اللعبة تعتمد على الحد الأدنى من الشرح وتثق بقدرة اللاعب على الاستنتاج دون تعليمات مباشرة.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر تأثير Limbo على الألعاب المستقلة، الجوائز أو التقدير النقدي الذي حصلت عليه، وإسهامها في إبراز الألعاب كوسيط فني.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'المقال يقدم معلومات صحيحة ومعروفة عن اللعبة، ويتجنب اختلاق تفاصيل أو نسب آراء شخصية إلى المطور كحقائق.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يستخدم لغة عربية سليمة، جمل مفهومة دون حشو مفرط، مع تنويع المفردات المناسب لمقال تحليلي عن لعبة فنية.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر اسم المطور (Playdead)، سنة الإصدار (2010)، ويصنّف اللعبة كإحدى الألعاب المستقلة (Indie).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يصف اعتماد اللعبة على التدرج الرمادي (أبيض وأسود)، استخدام الظلال (Silhouettes)، وتأثير حبة الفيلم (Film Grain).', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يشرح حبكة الفتى الباحث عن أخته، ويشير إلى غياب الحوارات، وغموض المعنى والنهاية.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'المقال يشير إلى غياب الموسيقى التقليدية واعتماد الأصوات البيئية والصمت لتعزيز الرعب والتوتر.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'المقال يذكر تأثير اللعبة على صناعة الألعاب المستقلة أو يشير إلى ألعاب مشابهة مثل Inside و Little Nightmares.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'يجب أن يحتوي المقال على عناوين فرعية بصيغة Markdown (###) لكل قسم رئيسي مطلوب: الأسلوب البصري والجو العام، القصة والسرد الصامت، أسلوب اللعب، التصميم الصوتي، التأثير والإرث، والخاتمة.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'في كل قسم رئيسي يجب تضمين قائمة نقطية (بدءًا بـ * أو -) تحتوي على نقطتين فرعيتين على الأقل توضح تفاصيل القسم.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'يجب وجود قسم بعنوان ### المنصات يتضمن قائمة نقطية صريحة بجميع المنصات الرسمية للعبة Limbo (Xbox 360, PlayStation 3, PC, Switch, iOS, Android).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'يجب أن يتضمن المقال عنوانًا فرعيًا واضحًا ### الخاتمة يكون منفصلًا عن باقي الأقسام ولا يدمج مع نص القسم السابق.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'يجب أن تكون عناوين الأقسام مرقمة بصيغة "### 1. العنوان"، "### 2. العنوان" … بحيث يظهر رقم الفقرة قبل اسم القسم.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': {'N': None}, 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}}

       {'criterion': "Incluye al menos dos ejemplos adicionales que usen la preposición 'de' con diferentes autores o obras, formateados con el título en cursiva y el autor en texto plano.", 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

prompt:
[{'content': 'Given: 1 SCU is 1m^3
Given: Laranite has a density of 11.5g/cm^3
Given: Titanium has a density of 4.5g/cm^3
Given: A Rock of 17198g
Given: A Rock is composed of 33.04% Laranite and 64.80% Titanium

How many SCU of each material is the rock composed of?', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The response calculates the mass of Laranite as 33.04\u202f% of 17,198\u202fg and the mass of Titanium as 64.80\u202f% of 17,198\u202fg, and the computed values are within a ±0.5\u202fg rounding tolerance.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response explicitly notes that 33.04\u202f%\u202f+\u202f64.80\u202f%\u202f≠\u202f100\u202f% and states the assumption made for the remaining 2.16\u202f% (e.g., ignored or treated as inert).', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response applies the formula\u202fVolume\u202f=\u202fMass\u202f/\u202fDensity for each material, using the given densities (11.5\u202fg/cm³ for Laranite, 4.5\u202fg/cm³ for Titanium) without algebraic errors.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

Nicolas description for references: 20 years old. 1m78, and a bit overweight, short skipy brown hairs & brown eyes behind glasses. He doesn’t grow past his shyness & awkward way with monica.
Monica Bellucci (58 years old) is more assertive in this story & don’t second guess on her desires.
For future references: 1: Nicolas calls her « Miss Monica » until further notice.

Monica Bellucci is finding herself in a journey to slowly seduce young & shy Nicolas, her daughter friend from school. He come to Monica & her daughter house for a study session. Monica notice Nicolas shifting his attention to her when she come to offer some drinks & smile to him. The 38 years difference in their age doesn’t even seem to register to him. Monica offer him a kiss on the cheek before nicolas took his leave for the evening. write their first meeting and only the first meeting.

 That night. Monica entertain thougts about Nicolas. Her growing influence on him make her want to plan more how she will seduce him. How the 38 years difference in age is an intoxicating thought for her in a plan. how that feeling of still being powerful and desirable make her want to become nicolas lover, teacher, seductress & more. She is startled to realize she want to lead him in every aspect of his life. But more so in her bedroom.
Nicolas never get past his shy & akward demeanor with Monica. It is something she find alluring.
Monica dont plan to share her plan with Nicolas. he is to remain unaware of it yet failing for it nonetheless.
Monica dont want an assertive Nicolas but one eager to please her.

Write Monica’s plan to continue to slowly entice nicolas. monica planing to massage nicolas shoulder as a reward for things he would do to her.
More importantly: how she will subtly, slowly manipulate him mind & brain with lights touch on the arms, soft kiss on the cheek & demands of foot massage from her. outline this plan as if Monica was writing in her diary. Monica plan is to entice, seduce & claim Nicolas for herself. The idea of doing this to a man 38 years younger than her arouse Monica.
1500 words ', 'role': 'user'}]

prompt: [{'content': 'Please write a short story about a character who goes on a journey of self-discovery and learns important lessons about themselves and the world around them. The story should be engaging and well-written, with interesting characters and a clear plot. It should also be appropriate for a general audience, so avoid using any language or themes that might be offensive or inappropriate', 'role': 'user'}]
reward_model:
{'ground_truth': '', 'rubrics': array([{'criterion': 'The protagonist undertakes a sustained journey or period of change in which they actively explore their identity, values, and desires, and this exploration is evident in the narrative.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist exhibits a distinct transformation from an initial state of ignorance, rigidity, or unhappiness to a later state of self‑awareness and personal growth, demonstrated through specific actions or reflections.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story shows the character acquiring knowledge about other people, cultures, or the wider world beyond their starting environment, with clear examples of new perspectives.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative explicitly presents at least one lesson learned about the character’s internal self and at least one lesson learned about the external world, and both are conveyed within the story.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'By the end of the story the protagonist’s beliefs, choices, confidence, or priorities are meaningfully different from the beginning, and specific moments illustrate this shift.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The plot follows a coherent arc with a clear setup, development, and resolution, including identifiable turning points that advance the story.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story contains a compelling conflict (internal or external) that drives the plot forward and creates narrative tension.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The main character is presented with distinct traits, motivations, and inner life that make their decisions specific and compelling.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist is well‑developed, with clear motivations, fears, or desires that are expressed through actions, thoughts, or dialogue.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'At least one supporting character is portrayed as an individual with unique attributes who contributes meaningfully to the protagonist’s growth.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative evokes believable emotional responses from the reader through internal conflict and relatable stakes, without resorting to melodrama.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The prose uses clear, fluent language, correct grammar, varied sentence structures, and natural dialogue, with no distracting awkward phrasing.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The text is free of grammatical errors, maintains a consistent tone, and is paced smoothly throughout the story.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story provides concrete sensory details (sights, sounds, smells, textures) that ground the reader in each setting.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The writing employs vivid sensory imagery and purposeful metaphors that create an immersive atmosphere.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist has explicit introspective passages where they contemplate their choices, fears, or lessons learned.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'By the story’s end the key lessons about self and world are communicated clearly through internal monologue, dialogue, or symbolic actions.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The content contains no offensive language, explicit sexual material, graphic violence, hate speech, or adult‑only themes, making it suitable for a general audience.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative portrays diverse people and viewpoints respectfully, avoids stereotypes, and handles conflict without glorifying harm.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Paragraphs and transitions are organized so that shifts in time, location, or perspective are easy to follow from beginning to end.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The response is presented as a cohesive short story with a clear beginning, middle, and end, not as an essay, outline, or summary.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story maintains a stable narrative perspective throughout without unexplained shifts.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Dialogue sounds believable, reveals character, advances plot or theme, and is correctly formatted with clear speech tags.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Scenes of action, dialogue, and reflection are proportioned so the story neither drags nor rushes through key moments.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The conclusion demonstrates the lasting impact of the journey on the character’s life or perspective, providing a satisfying sense of closure.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story ends with a sense of resolution or new direction that fits the journey, feeling earned rather than abrupt.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The setting, scenario, or combination of elements is distinct and not a direct copy of known reference plots.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The setting and events logically contribute to the lessons learned, weaving the moral into the narrative rather than stating it explicitly at the end.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story must contain a distinct narrative segment in which the protagonist explicitly states, in first‑person internal monologue, the precise insight they have gained about their own identity, and this insight must be directly linked to an earlier belief introduced in the opening paragraph.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist must begin the story holding a clearly defined, quantifiable belief (e.g., “perfection equals straight lines”) and, by the final paragraph, must have abandoned that belief and adopted a contrasting belief, with at least two separate scenes showing the belief transition.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The protagonist must encounter and accurately describe at least two culturally distinct practices or environmental systems outside their origin, and must demonstrate how each encounter revises a specific misconception stated earlier.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The narrative must present two separate, explicitly labeled lessons—one about the protagonist’s internal self and one about the external world—each concluded with a distinct line beginning with “Lesson:” or a similar marker.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'By the story’s end, the protagonist must take on a new societal role that directly reflects their internal change, and the text must name this role and explain how it differs from the initial role.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story must contain at least one uninterrupted paragraph of interior monologue (no dialogue) in which the protagonist analyzes their past actions using at least three distinct psychological terms (e.g., “cognitive dissonance,” “self‑efficacy,” “identity crisis”).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Each lesson identified in the story must be restated verbatim in a concluding “Moral” or “Lesson” section, using identical wording to the earlier statement.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The final scene must show a measurable impact of the protagonist’s growth on at least one other character’s behavior, quantified (e.g., “the elder smiled for the first time in years”).', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The setting must combine at least two genre‑mixing elements that are not commonly paired (e.g., a cartographer in a dystopian grid city exploring a magical wilderness) and must be explicitly described in the first 150 words.', 'points': 5, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The story must weave the central moral into at least three separate plot devices (e.g., a ruler, a map, a broken bridge) that each symbolically represent the same theme, and each device must be introduced before the midpoint and revisited after the climax.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}

       {'criterion': 'The response explicitly references IBM Maximo/MAS concepts (e.g., Mbo, MboSet, INVENTORY) when discussing inventory balance.', 'points': 7, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'Any missing details (Maximo version, site‑specific fields, launch context) are identified and reasonable assumptions are listed before the code.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The solution uses the Maximo object named **INVENTORY** (or its exact synonym) as the source MboSet for balance checking.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The answer computes available inventory as **CURBAL – RESERVEDQTY** (or states the exact formula it uses) and notes that it can be adjusted for site rules.', 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A complete, syntactically valid Jython automation script is provided that obtains the INVENTORY MboSet, reads CURBAL and RESERVEDQTY, and returns the available quantity.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'A complete, syntactically valid Java method is provided that uses MXServer, retrieves the INVENTORY MboSet, calculates available balance, and handles errors/return values.', 'points': 6, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The code calls `MXServer.getMXServer().getMboSet("INVENTORY", userInfo)` (or an equivalent Maximo API) to obtain the INVENTORY MboSet.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The solution sets a WHERE clause on the MboSet (if needed), calls `reset()`, and checks that the set is not empty before accessing records.', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'The entire quoted response contains 50 words or fewer.', 'points': 10, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': 'The content includes at least one concrete negative attribute of the proposed name (e.g., awkward sound, difficult spelling, lack of strength).', 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': 'The entire output consists of exactly one pair of double quotation marks enclosing the answer, with no preceding or trailing characters and no internal double‑quote characters.', 'points': 12, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},

       {'criterion': "The quoted answer directly references the partner's desire to give the children the partner's name (e.g., uses the phrase “your name”, “your last name”, or equivalent).", 'points': 9, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}},
       {'criterion': "All first‑person pronouns (I, my, me, I'd, etc.) appear only inside the quoted string; no first‑person pronouns occur outside the quotation marks.", 'points': 8, 'tags': {'function': '', 'parameters': '', 'verifier': 'llm'}}],
      dtype=object), 'style': 'rubric'}
